name: sonic5
description: This repository contains the code for the Sonic1 project. It is organized into three main parts:

scripts.perps:accounts: node --import "data:text/javascript,import { register } from 'node:module'; import { pathToFileURL } from 'node:url'; register('ts-node/esm', pathToFileURL('./'));" --experimental-specifier-resolution=node perps_accounts.ts
scripts.perps:accounts:dev: TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.json node --import "data:text/javascript,import { register } from 'node:module'; import { pathToFileURL } from 'node:url'; register('ts-node/esm', pathToFileURL('./'));" --experimental-specifier-resolution=node perps_accounts.ts
